Query.name: Select_All_Book
Query.QuerySQL: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY [PublishTime] DESC) AS ROWNUM,* FROM (select [BookID],[PublishTime],[ISBN],[BookType]=(select [TypeName] from t_BookType as t where t.BookTypeID=b.BookType),[BookName],[BookAuthor],[Publisher],[Price],[BookCase]=(select [CaseName] from t_Case as c where c.CaseID=b.BookCase),[Extant],[Stock],[Appointment],[BookLoan],[Logout],[Summary] from t_Book as b )as de WHERE 1=1 {2}) AS t WHERE t.ROWNUM>{0} AND t.ROWNUM<={1}

Query.name: Insert_Book
Query.QuerySQL: insert into t_Book ([ISBN],[BookType],[BookName],[BookAuthor],[Publisher],[Price],[BookCase],[Extant],[Stock],[Appointment],[BookLoan],[Logout],[Summary],[PublishTime]) select @ISBN,BookType=(select [BookTypeID] from t_BookType where [TypeName]=@BookType),@BookName,@BookAuthor,@Publisher,@Price,[BookCase]=(select [CaseID] from dbo.t_Case where [CaseName]=@BookCase),@Extant,@Stock,@Appointment,@BookLoan,@Logout,@Summary,@PublishTime

Query.name: Update_Book
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Book set [ISBN]=@ISBN,[BookName]=@BookName,[BookType]=(select [BookTypeID] from t_BookType where TypeName=@BookType),[BookAuthor]=@BookAuthor,[Publisher]=@Publisher,[Price]=@Price,[Summary]=@Summary,[BookCase]=(select [CaseID] from t_Case where CaseName=@BookCase),[Stock]=@Stock where [BookID]=@BookID

Query.name: Select_Book_Count_BookName
Query.QuerySQL: select COUNT([BookID]) from t_Book where 1=1 AND BookName like @BookName

Query.name: Select_Book_Count_BookAuthor
Query.QuerySQL: select COUNT([BookID]) from t_Book where 1=1 and BookAuthor like @BookAuthor

Query.name: Select_Book_BookID
Query.QuerySQL: select [Extant],[Appointment],[PublishTime],[Logout],[BookLoan],[ISBN], [BookName], [BookType]=(select [TypeName] from t_BookType as b2 where b1.BookType=b2.BookTypeID), [BookAuthor], [Publisher], [Price], [Summary], [BookCase]=(select [CaseName] from t_Case as b2 where b1.BookCase=b2.CaseID), [Stock], [BookID] from t_Book as b1 where BookID=@BookID

Query.name: Update_Book_UserBorrow
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Book set BookLoan=BookLoan+1 where ISBN=@ISBN update t_Book set Extant=Extant-1 where ISBN=@ISBN

Query.name: Update_Book_Return
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Book set Extant=Extant+1 where ISBN=@ISBN

Query.name: Select_Top15_Book
Query.QuerySQL: select top 15 [BookName],[BookLoan] from t_Book order by [BookLoan] desc

Query.name: Update_Book_Logout
Query.QuerySQL: update t_Book set Logout=@Logout where BookID=@BookID
